tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I found Dr Swamy very genuine.She was extremely patient in listening to my problems.Her diagnosis was accurate and the  anti allergic medicine she prescribed gave me instant relief from excessive runny nose and sneezing issue.
I would surely consult her in future Incase there is a need.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words .I am humbledüôèüèΩ

review: I and my family were down with covid. My cough had become unbearable and that's when I contacted Dr.Niveditha, she carefully listened to all my symptoms and gave me medication. She also recommended a couple of blood tests to determine the severity of the disease in our bodies. Post the blood test, few more medications were given and all of us in my family are back to shape.Thank you so much. Best doctor ever :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I certainly would recommend her as she is highly knowledgeable in her field and pretty patient. I Consulted her pre-, peri- & post- Covid. She heeded my long queries with patience and gave detailed answers. I took the medications she prescribed after she checked for interactions and guess what?! I recovered relatively soon. Had moderate to serve symptoms, by day 5 of taking the prescription I was mostly out of it, and by day 10 I'm back to normal. Have to say, I'm pretty satisfied with the treatment.
reply_text: Thank you Rohan. Happy to have you as my patient. üëç

review: I was suffering from extreme cough and throat pain. I took teleconsultation and doctor called me. She explained me what the disease trend is and prescribed me some medicines. I am now completely ok. Really thankful and grateful to her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I asked a query after the audio call but the doctor didn't respond back. Eventually I had to reach out to another doctorEven during the treatment time she had network issue and eventually we had to do audio call instead of videoShe was in hurry and didn't listen to me properly and just provided the prescription.
After consulting for my grandmother's health, I see improvement & reduction in cough. Suggested few tests to be taken. Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Nivedita is excellent in addressing the patient issues and giving the correct remedy to recover from it. *** ** *** **** ****** we would recommend for fever, cold and cough. Thanks doctor for timely support.
Will listen patients problems calmly and prescribed satisfactorily. Now patient condition improving .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Good and consultant . Would be able to explain the disease and causes for it. She would understand the cause . She will give lot time to listen to patient .
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback Mr Mohith.

review: After lot of deliberation( due to lockdown condition) had taken an appointment for my wife for consultation .Found doctor to be calm and composed .Gives adequate time to understand the problem ,pain of patient with any other medical history details before jumping to prescribing medicine . Unlike many other Dr who will jump to surgery first ,treatment later :-),Dr was kind enough to advise us to  try non-surgical steps .Happy with her consultation and clinical approach .    Thankyou very much Dr
reply_text: Thank you sir for your kind words.
